title._content: ["The Fens," Lorenzo Easton Woodhouse house, Huntting Lane, East Hampton, New York.  (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["The Fens," Lorenzo Easton Woodhouse house, Huntting Lane, East Hampton, New York. Pathway] [1914] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Joseph Greenleaf Thorp, by 1903. Landscape: Maurice Collins, gardener. Associated name: Mary Kennedy (Mrs. Lorenzo E.) Woodhouse.Today: House and garden not extant. Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.21803 Call Number: LC-J717-X110- 97
